SVGFilterElement.summary: The SVGFilterElement interface provides access to the properties of filter elements, as well as methods to manipulate them.

SVGFilterElementFilterUnits.summary: The filterUnits read-only property of the interface reflects the {{SVGAttr("filterUnits")}} attribute of the given {{SVGElement("filter")}} element. It takes one of the SVG_UNIT_TYPE_* constants defined in .

SVGFilterElementHeight.summary: The height read-only property of the interface describes the vertical size of an SVG filter primitive as a .

remarks.para: It reflects the {{SVGAttr("height")}} attribute of the filter element. The attribute is a <length> or a <percentage> relative to the height of the filter region. The default value is 100%. The property value is a length in user coordinate system units.

-SVG tutorial: Filter effects
-SVG filter primitive attributes
-CSS blend-mode data type
-CSS mix-blend-mode property

SVGFilterElementHref.summary: The href read-only property of the interface reflects the {{SVGAttr("href")}} or {{SVGAttr("xlink:href")}} {{deprecated_inline}} attribute of the given {{SVGElement("filter")}} element.

SVGFilterElementPrimitiveUnits.summary: The primitiveUnits read-only property of the interface reflects the {{SVGAttr("primitiveUnits")}} attribute of the given {{SVGElement("filter")}} element. It takes one of the SVG_UNIT_TYPE_* constants defined in .

SVGFilterElementWidth.summary: The width read-only property of the interface describes the horizontal size of an SVG filter primitive as a .

remarks.para: It reflects the {{SVGAttr("width")}} attribute of the filter element. The attribute is a <length> or a <percentage> relative to the width of the filter region. The default value is 100%. The property value is a length in user coordinate system units.

-SVG tutorial: Filter effects
-SVG Filter primitive attributes
-CSS blend-mode data type
-CSS mix-blend-mode property

SVGFilterElementX.summary: The x read-only property of the interface describes the horizontal coordinate of the position of an SVG filter primitive as a .

remarks.para: It reflects the {{SVGAttr("x")}} attribute of the filter element. The attribute is a <length> or <percentage>. The <coordinate> is a length in the user coordinate system that is the given distance from the origin of the user coordinate system along the x-axis. If the x attribute is a percent value, the property value is relative to the width of the filter region in user coordinate system units. The default value is 0.

-SVG tutorial: Filter effects
-SVG Filter primitive attributes
-CSS blend-mode data type
-CSS mix-blend-mode property

SVGFilterElementY.summary: The y read-only property of the interface describes the vertical coordinate of the position of an SVG filter primitive as a .

remarks.para: It reflects the {{SVGAttr("y")}} attribute of the filter element. The attribute is a <length> or <percentage>. The <coordinate> is a length in the user coordinate system that is the given distance from the origin of the filter along the y-axis. If the y attribute is a percent value, the property value is a relative to the height of the filter region in user coordinate system units. The default value is 0.

-SVG tutorial: Filter effects
-SVG Filter primitive attributes
-CSS blend-mode data type
-CSS mix-blend-mode property
